description:
A sip of something cool goes a long way to keeping your little adventurer comfortable on hot days. The classic Klean Kanteen wide-mouth bottle with an internally threaded cap for greater thermal performance. Stainless steel with a chip-resistant finish stands up to the rigours of daily life.

  • Made from certified 90% post-consumer recycled 18/8 stainless steel that doesn't impart any flavours and is easy to clean
  • Double-walled vacuum-insulated keeps drinks cool for up to 33 hours. Not intended for hot drinks, as the risk of little ones to take a big gulp is far too high
  • Klean Coat™ finish is resistant to chipping and daily wear and tear
  • Internally threaded TK Closure design
  • Sip-through straw has a swivel loop for easy carrying
name: Klean Kanteen VI TK Wide Twist Cap Bottle 355ml
